description: Enjoy the rich flavours of Italy with this hearty roast lamb recipe. Served with roasted veggies, this is the perfect weekend meal to serve friends and family.
keywords: Roast lamb,Roast,Seafood free,Holidays & entertaining,Fresh ingredients,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Potato,High protein,Parsnip,Soy free,Comfort food,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tuscan roast lamb with roasted vegetables Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place lamb into a roasting pan. Using a small sharp knife, make small deep cuts into lamb and insert garlic. Sprinkle tuscan seasoning over lamb. Roast for 45 minutes.
Add potatoes and pumpkin to pan and roast for 1 hour.
Transfer lamb to a chopping board and loosely cover with foil. Stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
Transfer potatoes and pumpkin to a large plate. Place in oven to keep warm.

Pour off all but 2 tablespoons of pan juices from the roasting pan. Place pan over a medium heat. Sprinkle flour over and stir until combined. Slowly add reserved chicken stock, stirring constantly until smooth. Bring mixture to the boil. Simmer for 2 minutes or until gravy has thickened.
Thinly slice lamb. Serve with roast potatoes, pumpkin, gravy and carrot parsnip mash.

To make carrot parsnip mash; place carrots and parsnip into a saucepan and cover with cold water. Place over a high heat until mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Drain and mash.
